item.title: beware the cute girls
item.description: i actually really like these photos of my youngest great niece, she's a cute wee thing. but of course i can't just take family photos so here's an utterly inconsequential vispo! my faceboot page suggests other people do find the photos cute too but of course there must be an instinctive factor in play here, she's my family so i perhaps I find the wee thing more cute and fun than others would

channel.item:
<title.bittiness https://dylanharris.org/blog/2022/b18.shtml https://dylanharris.org/blog/2022/b18.shtml
all the things i didn't write while i was writing ssc
arts & ego Tue, 7 September 2022 00:00:00 CET

item.title: team building
item.description: i've finally worked out what it is i hate about teambuilding events. ignoring the detail that they have the same goal as orgies (bonding), but without the fun. It's that all such events produce something that is completely pointless, teaching people that teambuilding is a waste of effort, that it has no utility, as though their initiator is secretly working for the other side.

item.title: mail fail
item.description: in the interests of increasing security, apple mail blocked me from getting my mail, which contained notification of a security breach, thus apple mail's arrogant attempt to increase security actually reduced it. I'm going back to outlook while i search for a mail product that has this weird propely called 'it works'.

item.title: blogroll
item.description: blogroll.org - what a damned good idea. It's a personally curated list of links to favourite blogs.

item.title: links and heroes
item.description: The oldest page on arts & ego, nearly, returns after a four year absence. I was prompted to bring it back by blogroll.org.

item.title: ssc
item.description: The static site checker has reached alpha, and I think is pretty neat now, so it has it's own site.

item.title: site search
item.description: A find page has been introduced.
